meanings.definition: The digestive gland of crustaceans, consisting of the liver and pancreas.
meanings.sent1: The hepatopancreases in lobsters help with digestion.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the hepatopancreases of crabs to understand their digestive system.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally mistook the hepatopancreases for a different organ while preparing the seafood dish.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was as complex as the intertwining hepatopancreases of a shrimp.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the hepatopancreases stood out against the pale shell of the crayfish.

meanings.definition: The organ responsible for digestion and absorption of nutrients in certain aquatic animals.
meanings.sent1: The hepatopancreases of fish play a crucial role in their digestive process.
meanings.sent2: Aquarists ensure the health of the hepatopancreases in their aquatic pets.
meanings.sent3: The otter playfully chased after the fish, unaware of the importance of their hepatopancreases.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed smoothly, carrying nutrients to the hepatopancreases of the creatures below.
meanings.sent5: The graceful dance of the jellyfish resembled the intricate workings of their hepatopancreases.
